speaker: MACBETH
text_entry: SCENE III. The same.

speaker: MACBETH
text_entry: Knocking within. Enter a Porter

speaker: Porter
text_entry: Here's a knocking indeed! If a

speaker: Porter
text_entry: man were porter of hell-gate, he should have

speaker: Porter
text_entry: old turning the key.

speaker: Porter
text_entry: Knocking within

speaker: Porter
text_entry: Knock,

speaker: Porter
text_entry: knock, knock! Who's there, i' the name of

speaker: Porter
text_entry: Beelzebub? Here's a farmer, that hanged

speaker: Porter
text_entry: himself on the expectation of plenty: come in

speaker: Porter
text_entry: time; have napkins enow about you; here

speaker: Porter
text_entry: you'll sweat for't.

speaker: Porter
text_entry: Knocking within

speaker: Porter
text_entry: Knock,

speaker: Porter
text_entry: knock! Who's there, in the other devil's

speaker: Porter
text_entry: name? Faith, here's an equivocator, that could

speaker: Porter
text_entry: swear in both the scales against either scale;

speaker: Porter
text_entry: who committed treason enough for God's sake,

speaker: Porter
text_entry: yet could not equivocate to heaven: O, come

speaker: Porter
text_entry: in, equivocator.

speaker: Porter
text_entry: Knocking within

speaker: Porter
text_entry: Knock,

speaker: Porter
text_entry: knock, knock! Who's there? Faith, here's an

speaker: Porter
text_entry: English tailor come hither, for stealing out of

speaker: Porter
text_entry: a French hose: come in, tailor; here you may

speaker: Porter
text_entry: roast your goose.

speaker: Porter
text_entry: Knocking within

speaker: Porter
text_entry: Knock,

speaker: Porter
text_entry: knock; never at quiet! What are you? But

speaker: Porter
text_entry: this place is too cold for hell. I'll devil-porter

speaker: Porter
text_entry: it no further: I had thought to have let in

speaker: Porter
text_entry: some of all professions that go the primrose

speaker: Porter
text_entry: way to the everlasting bonfire.

speaker: Porter
text_entry: Knocking within

speaker: Porter
text_entry: Anon, anon! I pray you, remember the porter.

speaker: Porter
text_entry: Opens the gate

speaker: Porter
text_entry: Enter MACDUFF and LENNOX

speaker: MACDUFF
text_entry: Was it so late, friend, ere you went to bed,

speaker: MACDUFF
text_entry: That you do lie so late?

speaker: Porter
text_entry: 'Faith sir, we were carousing till the

speaker: Porter
text_entry: second cock: and drink, sir, is a great

speaker: Porter
text_entry: provoker of three things.

speaker: MACDUFF
text_entry: What three things does drink especially provoke?

speaker: Porter
text_entry: Marry, sir, nose-painting, sleep, and

speaker: Porter
text_entry: urine. Lechery, sir, it provokes, and unprovokes;

speaker: Porter
text_entry: it provokes the desire, but it takes

speaker: Porter
text_entry: away the performance: therefore, much drink

speaker: Porter
text_entry: may be said to be an equivocator with lechery:

speaker: Porter
text_entry: it makes him, and it mars him; it sets

speaker: Porter
text_entry: him on, and it takes him off; it persuades him,

speaker: Porter
text_entry: and disheartens him; makes him stand to, and

speaker: Porter
text_entry: not stand to; in conclusion, equivocates him

speaker: Porter
text_entry: in a sleep, and, giving him the lie, leaves him.

speaker: MACDUFF
text_entry: I believe drink gave thee the lie last night.

speaker: Porter
text_entry: That it did, sir, i' the very throat on

speaker: Porter
text_entry: me: but I requited him for his lie; and, I

speaker: Porter
text_entry: think, being too strong for him, though he took

speaker: Porter
text_entry: up my legs sometime, yet I made a shift to cast

speaker: Porter
text_entry: him.

speaker: MACDUFF
text_entry: Is thy master stirring?

speaker: MACDUFF
text_entry: Enter MACBETH

speaker: MACDUFF
text_entry: Our knocking has awaked him; here he comes.

speaker: LENNOX
text_entry: Good morrow, noble sir.

speaker: MACBETH
text_entry: Good morrow, both.

speaker: MACDUFF
text_entry: Is the king stirring, worthy thane?

speaker: MACBETH
text_entry: Not yet.

speaker: MACDUFF
text_entry: He did command me to call timely on him:

speaker: MACDUFF
text_entry: I have almost slipp'd the hour.

speaker: MACBETH
text_entry: I'll bring you to him.

speaker: MACDUFF
text_entry: I know this is a joyful trouble to you;

speaker: MACDUFF
text_entry: But yet 'tis one.

speaker: MACBETH
text_entry: The labour we delight in physics pain.

speaker: MACBETH
text_entry: This is the door.

speaker: MACDUFF
text_entry: I'll make so bold to call,

speaker: MACDUFF
text_entry: For 'tis my limited service.

speaker: MACDUFF
text_entry: Exit

speaker: LENNOX
text_entry: Goes the king hence to-day?

speaker: MACBETH
text_entry: He does: he did appoint so.

speaker: LENNOX
text_entry: The night has been unruly: where we lay,

speaker: LENNOX
text_entry: Our chimneys were blown down; and, as they say,

speaker: LENNOX
text_entry: Lamentings heard i' the air; strange screams of death,

speaker: LENNOX
text_entry: And prophesying with accents terrible

speaker: LENNOX
text_entry: Of dire combustion and confused events

speaker: LENNOX
text_entry: New hatch'd to the woeful time: the obscure bird

speaker: LENNOX
text_entry: Clamour'd the livelong night: some say, the earth

speaker: LENNOX
text_entry: Was feverous and did shake.

speaker: MACBETH
text_entry: 'Twas a rough night.

speaker: LENNOX
text_entry: My young remembrance cannot parallel

speaker: LENNOX
text_entry: A fellow to it.

speaker: LENNOX
text_entry: Re-enter MACDUFF

speaker: MACDUFF
text_entry: O horror, horror, horror! Tongue nor heart

speaker: MACDUFF
text_entry: Cannot conceive nor name thee!

speaker: LENNOX
text_entry: What's the matter.

speaker: MACDUFF
text_entry: Confusion now hath made his masterpiece!

speaker: MACDUFF
text_entry: Most sacrilegious murder hath broke ope

speaker: MACDUFF
text_entry: The Lord's anointed temple, and stole thence

speaker: MACDUFF
text_entry: The life o' the building!

speaker: MACBETH
text_entry: What is 't you say? the life?

speaker: LENNOX
text_entry: Mean you his majesty?

speaker: MACDUFF
text_entry: Approach the chamber, and destroy your sight

speaker: MACDUFF
text_entry: With a new Gorgon: do not bid me speak;

speaker: MACDUFF
text_entry: See, and then speak yourselves.

speaker: MACDUFF
text_entry: Exeunt MACBETH and LENNOX

speaker: MACDUFF
text_entry: Awake, awake!

speaker: MACDUFF
text_entry: Ring the alarum-bell. Murder and treason!

speaker: MACDUFF
text_entry: Banquo and Donalbain! Malcolm! awake!

speaker: MACDUFF
text_entry: Shake off this downy sleep, death's counterfeit,

speaker: MACDUFF
text_entry: And look on death itself! up, up, and see

speaker: MACDUFF
text_entry: The great doom's image! Malcolm! Banquo!

speaker: MACDUFF
text_entry: As from your graves rise up, and walk like sprites,

speaker: MACDUFF
text_entry: To countenance this horror! Ring the bell.

speaker: MACDUFF
text_entry: Bell rings

speaker: MACDUFF
text_entry: Enter LADY MACBETH

speaker: LADY MACBETH
text_entry: What's the business,

speaker: LADY MACBETH
text_entry: That such a hideous trumpet calls to parley

speaker: LADY MACBETH
text_entry: The sleepers of the house? speak, speak!

speaker: MACDUFF
text_entry: O gentle lady,

speaker: MACDUFF
text_entry: 'Tis not for you to hear what I can speak:

speaker: MACDUFF
text_entry: The repetition, in a woman's ear,

speaker: MACDUFF
text_entry: Would murder as it fell.

speaker: MACDUFF
text_entry: Enter BANQUO

speaker: MACDUFF
text_entry: O Banquo, Banquo,

speaker: MACDUFF
text_entry: Our royal master 's murder'd!

speaker: LADY MACBETH
text_entry: Woe, alas!

speaker: LADY MACBETH
text_entry: What, in our house?

speaker: BANQUO
text_entry: Too cruel any where.

speaker: BANQUO
text_entry: Dear Duff, I prithee, contradict thyself,

speaker: BANQUO
text_entry: And say it is not so.

speaker: BANQUO
text_entry: Re-enter MACBETH and LENNOX, with ROSS

speaker: MACBETH
text_entry: Had I but died an hour before this chance,

speaker: MACBETH
text_entry: I had lived a blessed time; for, from this instant,

speaker: MACBETH
text_entry: There 's nothing serious in mortality:

speaker: MACBETH
text_entry: All is but toys: renown and grace is dead;

speaker: MACBETH
text_entry: The wine of life is drawn, and the mere lees

speaker: MACBETH
text_entry: Is left this vault to brag of.

speaker: MACBETH
text_entry: Enter MALCOLM and DONALBAIN

speaker: DONALBAIN
text_entry: What is amiss?

speaker: MACBETH
text_entry: You are, and do not know't:

speaker: MACBETH
text_entry: The spring, the head, the fountain of your blood

speaker: MACBETH
text_entry: Is stopp'd; the very source of it is stopp'd.

speaker: MACDUFF
text_entry: Your royal father 's murder'd.

speaker: MALCOLM
text_entry: O, by whom?

speaker: LENNOX
text_entry: Those of his chamber, as it seem'd, had done 't:

speaker: LENNOX
text_entry: Their hands and faces were an badged with blood;

speaker: LENNOX
text_entry: So were their daggers, which unwiped we found

speaker: LENNOX
text_entry: Upon their pillows:

speaker: LENNOX
text_entry: They stared, and were distracted; no man's life

speaker: LENNOX
text_entry: Was to be trusted with them.

speaker: MACBETH
text_entry: O, yet I do repent me of my fury,

speaker: MACBETH
text_entry: That I did kill them.

speaker: MACDUFF
text_entry: Wherefore did you so?

speaker: MACBETH
text_entry: Who can be wise, amazed, temperate and furious,

speaker: MACBETH
text_entry: Loyal and neutral, in a moment? No man:

speaker: MACBETH
text_entry: The expedition my violent love

speaker: MACBETH
text_entry: Outrun the pauser, reason. Here lay Duncan,

speaker: MACBETH
text_entry: His silver skin laced with his golden blood;

speaker: MACBETH
text_entry: And his gash'd stabs look'd like a breach in nature

speaker: MACBETH
text_entry: For ruin's wasteful entrance: there, the murderers,

speaker: MACBETH
text_entry: Steep'd in the colours of their trade, their daggers

speaker: MACBETH
text_entry: Unmannerly breech'd with gore: who could refrain,

speaker: MACBETH
text_entry: That had a heart to love, and in that heart

speaker: MACBETH
text_entry: Courage to make 's love kno wn?

speaker: LADY MACBETH
text_entry: Help me hence, ho!

speaker: MACDUFF
text_entry: Look to the lady.

speaker: MALCOLM
text_entry: [Aside to DONALBAIN]  Why do we hold our tongues,

speaker: MALCOLM
text_entry: That most may claim this argument for ours?

speaker: DONALBAIN
text_entry: [Aside to MALCOLM]  What should be spoken here,

speaker: DONALBAIN
text_entry: where our fate,

speaker: DONALBAIN
text_entry: Hid in an auger-hole, may rush, and seize us?

speaker: DONALBAIN
text_entry: Let 's away;

speaker: DONALBAIN
text_entry: Our tears are not yet brew'd.

speaker: MALCOLM
text_entry: [Aside to DONALBAIN]        Nor our strong sorrow

speaker: MALCOLM
text_entry: Upon the foot of motion.

speaker: BANQUO
text_entry: Look to the lady:

speaker: BANQUO
text_entry: LADY MACBETH is carried out

speaker: BANQUO
text_entry: And when we have our naked frailties hid,

speaker: BANQUO
text_entry: That suffer in exposure, let us meet,

speaker: BANQUO
text_entry: And question this most bloody piece of work,

speaker: BANQUO
text_entry: To know it further. Fears and scruples shake us:

speaker: BANQUO
text_entry: In the great hand of God I stand; and thence

speaker: BANQUO
text_entry: Against the undivulged pretence I fight

speaker: BANQUO
text_entry: Of treasonous malice.

speaker: MACDUFF
text_entry: And so do I.

speaker: ALL
text_entry: So all.

speaker: MACBETH
text_entry: Let's briefly put on manly readiness,

speaker: MACBETH
text_entry: And meet i' the hall together.

speaker: ALL
text_entry: Well contented.

speaker: ALL
text_entry: Exeunt all but Malcolm and Donalbain.

speaker: MALCOLM
text_entry: What will you do? Let's not consort with them:

speaker: MALCOLM
text_entry: To show an unfelt sorrow is an office

speaker: MALCOLM
text_entry: Which the false man does easy. I'll to England.

speaker: DONALBAIN
text_entry: To Ireland, I; our separated fortune

speaker: DONALBAIN
text_entry: Shall keep us both the safer: where we are,

speaker: DONALBAIN
text_entry: There's daggers in men's smiles: the near in blood,

speaker: DONALBAIN
text_entry: The nearer bloody.

speaker: MALCOLM
text_entry: This murderous shaft that's shot

speaker: MALCOLM
text_entry: Hath not yet lighted, and our safest way

speaker: MALCOLM
text_entry: Is to avoid the aim. Therefore, to horse;

speaker: MALCOLM
text_entry: And let us not be dainty of leave-taking,

speaker: MALCOLM
text_entry: But shift away: there's warrant in that theft

speaker: MALCOLM
text_entry: Which steals itself, when there's no mercy left.

speaker: MALCOLM
text_entry: Exeunt
